channel.title: Shoot Meristem on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Shoot Meristem on funPlantGenes

item.title: CaJOINTLESS
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaJOINTLESS Gene Name: Cajointless Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaJOINTLESS is a MADS-box gene involved in suppression of vegetative growth in all shoot meristems in pepper.

item.title: CsLFY
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa1G000050.1 Gene Symbol: CsLFY Gene Name: LEAFY Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsLFY is required for shoot meristem maintenance via interaction with WUSCHEL in cucumber.

item.title: Ct2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb005840 Gene Symbol: Ct2 Gene Name: compact plant2 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: GmSPL9d
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.02G177500 Gene Symbol: GmSPL9d Gene Name: SQUAMOSA PROMOTER BINDING PROTEIN-LIKE9 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmSPL9d is expressed in the shoot apical meristem and axillary meristems (AMs) of soya bean.

item.title: HvFT4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvFT4 Gene Name: FLOWERING LOCUS T4 Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: FLOWERING LOCUS T4 (HvFT4) delays flowering and decreases floret fertility in barley.

item.title: MtNAM
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtNAM Gene Name: NO APICAL MERISTEM Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: NO APICAL MERISTEM (MtNAM) regulates floral organ identity and lateral organ separation in Medicago truncatula.

item.title: MtSERF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtSERF1 Gene Name: SOMATIC EMBRYO RELATED FACTOR1 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor MtSERF1 of the ERF subfamily identified by transcriptional profiling is required for somatic embryogenesis induced by auxin plus cytokinin in Medicago truncatula.

item.title: OsZIP3
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os04g52310 RAPdb gene ID: Os04g0613000 Gene Symbol: OsZIP3 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: PpeDAM6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PpeDAM6 Gene Name: DORMANCY-ASSOCIATED MADS-BOX 6 Genome: Species: Prunus persica Functional Descriptions: PpeDAM6 overexpression in Arabidopsis induces an AGL24-like phenotype.
